name: Grab That Wheel
description:
Grab That Wheel is a game where you can drive around in a big wide city.
Choose between 5 vehicles: tank, fast car, bulldozer, police car and van.
Drive around, discover and destroy!
This game is currently in alpha!

Controls

W,S,A,D – Move
Q,E – Flip vehicle
1,2,3,4,5 – Change vehicle
Mouse – Look around
LMB – Shoot
Enter – Fullscreen
R – Restart
Esc – Quit game

Vehicles
1 – Tank
2 – Fast car
3 – Bulldozer
4 – Police car
5 – Van

Enjoy!
